Text: ...Shadow...
...Garden?
Release that possessed individual immediately!

Heh... I totally pulled it off! This is the
scenario I've always dreamed about!

...Who the hell are you? Are you from this remote
town?
What?!

Did you wander here by accident?! You still seem
to be childrenâ€”
Excuse me! Are you patronizing us?!
Well, we do look like children...
Anyway, you need to get out of here immediatelyâ€”

I'm afraid I can't let you do that. Now that you've
seen us, you must die.

Stop! They're just children! Besides, they've got
nothing to do with this!
Nothing to do with this... Are you sure about that?

The strong presence of magic emanating from them...
It's hard to believe they're just local children from
these parts.
W-Well...that's true...but...!
The Shadow Garden, huh?

The Shadow Garden... Of course.! Heh, heh, heh...
That explains it!

I never expected it...to be real! I thought it was
just the ramblings of a senile old fool!
Sergey?!
That's right. The Shadow Garden...

It's a mysterious organization that's been active
recently, causing skirmishes on the outskirts of
Midgar Kingdom. Isn't that right?
A mysterious organization?!

Heh... If you know about us, that makes things
simpler!
Now then! Release Karen!
Wh-Who are you? Why are you helping me?!
Ngh...!
I'll give you...first aid.
First aid...?!
The pain...is alleviating?!

I can't heal you completely here...but I've
temporarily...halted the progression.

Heal me completely? Y-You mean you can cure...
the possession?!

...I can heal you later, so I'll stop you from moving
for now.
Huhâ€”?!

U-Ughh...! M-My body...! Is this slime...?! It's like
being tied up with ropeâ€”

You might become a test subject later...so I'll
restrain you to make sure you don't move.
Test subject?!

Besides, if you move...it'll be difficult to
distinguish friend from foe.
What the hell is thisâ€”
Aaargghhh!!!
Fr-From the ground?! What is going onâ€”
Aaaagghh!!!
All the surrounding soldiers...in one instant!

Impaling... It's decent enough. I actually wanted
to make the ground collapse...
...Heh, heh, heh...!

This unfamiliar fighting style using slime that was
mentioned in the orders... It's certainly different
from that of us Cult Children!
As for you...Karen von Herzog!

I've figured it out! You're in cohorts with this
Shadow Garden!
What...?!

You're calling me a traitor to the Cult?! You've got
some nerve after you've been in communication with
the Cult's enemies!

You're the one who has no trace of morality!
It's only fitting that you and your family are
purged!

N-Nonsense! These are just intruders who appeared out
of nowhereâ€”

You call them mere intruders after they effortlessly
slaughtered my Velgalta soldiers?! What nonsenseâ€”

Hey! Quit ignoring me and carrying on the chatter
between yourselves!
No way! How did you just dodge that?!
What's with this...reckless sword technique?

W-Wait...that was obviously...a swing in the completely
wrong direction!
Quit moving around...
Ughh...! I-I'm being choked...!

I see... Your magic, strength, and agility are
excellent, but you're fatally lacking in technique!

Ve-Velgalta's Seven Blades are impressive! I can't
believe he managed to discern the characteristics
of my blade at a glance!

And more than your swordsmanship, there's something
else you fundementally lackâ€”ample combat experience
to gauge your opponent's abilities!

As an unprecedented enemy...I won't underestimate
you!
Ack...!
Swish, swish, swish, swish, swish!!!

What are you doing?! You're wasting all your power
and speed!

Hah! This girl wields her swords as if she's
possessed by something, much like yourself!
Hit him somewheeeere!!!
Oh, I hit him!
Did it work?!
Hah! Was that supposed to hurt?

No way... He's unharmed?! My swish-swish-swish hit
him directly!

Damn it... It didn't work...! He really is no
ordinary man...

Yeah, it didn't have any effect on him... This is...
quite intriguing.

You must never point your blade at the wrong opponent
without knowing yourself. I'll teach you this golden
rule of battle at the cost of your life!
Watch out!!!
Owwwwww?!
Huh?!
Huh?!
Heheh...

Hey! Who tries to split someone down the middle
head-on?!

You're one of the Seven Blades, so at least try using
some of your fancy, flashy sword techniques!
What is up with this girl's magic defense?!

She can't handle magic properly at all, but how is
she such a tank...?!
Ha, ha, ha... What a ridiculous joke!
Unbelievable!

You were hit head-on by Sergey's greatsword
technique, and all you got was a small bump
on the head...?!

Now it's my turn to attack! Swish, swish, swish,
swish, swish!!!
Ahh... Why isn't she trying to hit him?!

She's not missing on purpose... Gamma's doing her
best, but she just can't hit him...
Seriously?!

You may be some kind of "gifted" individual, but
there are ways to deal with your kind...
...Like this!
Ack?!
Hyaaaah!
Gyaagh?!

Wh-What incredible technique! So this is the skill
of Velalta's Seven Blades!

But it's just a scratch! I won't be defeated over
something as trivial as this!
...This is bad.
Yeah, this is bad.
You can tell as well?
Of course I can!

Sergey's swordsmanship isn't as crude as it looks.
If anything, it's based on precision and analysis.

He's attacking her with precise strikes to break
through her robust magic defenses.

Then, he cuts through the resulting cracks in her
defense with his skillful blade... That's his technique.

Yeah, he wields his blade efficiently... It's
completely different from Gamma's style,
which is all about brute force.
If they keeping fight like this...Gamma will lose.
